Formulary Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
G Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary, but guidelines applyadded v2.5
N Pharmaceutical substance is NOT in the formularyadded v2.5
R Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary, but restrictions applyadded v2.5
